manifestDescription.description: The description of this addon in manifest.json
manifestDescription.message: Download all items in a webpage that match a pattern

errorDownloadPathMustBeRelative.message: This must be relative to Firefox's download folder.

removeAfterDownload.message: Remove files from native manager after download

tryDisableShowOnlyChecked.message: Try disabling show only checked items.

scrapeAllTabsTitle.message: Scrape all tabs in the current window

maxConcurrentDownloadsHelp.message: The maximum number of concurrent downloads.

keepHistoryHelp.message: If you move files after download but still want to be able use "on conflict: skip", the addon can remember previous downloads and filenames. If you disable history, downloads can only be skipped if they already exist in the download folder.

maxHistoryHelp.message: The maximum number of downloads to remember.

watchControls.message: Immediately save changes to controls in the popup

watchControlsHelp.message: Changes to controls in the popup are saved immediately when checked. Otherwise, they are saved when you press the download button.

grantAllUrlsPermission.message: Allow the addon to scrape links and media in any tab

removePermissions.message: Remove all optional permissions granted to this addon

removePermissionsSuccess.message: All optional permissions have been removed.

needAllUrlsPermission.message: Download Star requires additional permissions to scrape all tabs. Please enable this feature in the addon options by clicking on "Allow the addon to scrape links and media in any tab" under the Optional Permissions heading.
